name: High Growth Communications
goal: We are a communications agency specialised in the promotion of legal cannabis with a focus on the medicinal, ecological and helpful aspects of this plant.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Public Health, Trade
euInitiatives:
Harmonisation of laws relating to cannabis.
Health laws regarding cannabis
Tobacco legislation
Trade initiatives
Coordination with the ACP
Public Health
Consumer rights
